Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.convenience.Cylinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoundingVolume
public class Cylinder extends Object implements BoundingVolume
A cylinder with a radius and two end points. Makes a pill shape.
